dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5151 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a grant program improving treatment for pregnant and postpartum women.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a grant program improving treatment for pregnant and postpartum women.

section.header: Improving treatment for pregnant and postpartum women
section.text: Section 508(s) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290bb–1(s)) is amended in the first sentence by inserting before the period the following: , and $100,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023.
